@Princess_1509 Hi Sarah! CEB Prepaid Baggage is available in one (1) piece 20kg and 32kg options . .Passengers may get up to any two (2) of these weight options, for a maximum of two (2) pieces of baggage and a combined weight of 64kg. Visit https://t.co/lXA1ChoAfE for more information.

@talinang1490 Hi Czarina Joy. You may handcarry noodles, shampoo and toothpaste. Liquids, aerosols & gels (LAGs), may be allowed in your hand carry. Each item must not exceed 100ml. The basis of the restriction will be container, which should not exceed 100ml. Blower is for check-in. See you!

@mdc429 I'm sorry to hear that you haven't received your refund yet Michael. We will help you look into it. We encourage you to message us via Charlie the chatbot thru this link: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK, and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent.

data.text: @jsnfls I'm sorry to hear this Jason. You may do the following troubleshooting and then try again. -Clear your browser's cache and cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Use Google Chrome browser.  For mobile app, ensure that the version is updated.
@bobramos69 You're most welcome! Have a great day ahead!
@iamWadhwa Hello Sahil. Got this.  Don't worry, I'll let your case handler know that you reached out so that we can send you an update. Please expect an email from us soon. Thanks for your patience!

@pcyaab Hi there! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@hey_yunoe Yes, hey_yunoe. We only allow foldable umbrellas inside the hand carry. Stay safe!
@akosikulot Our team will send you feedback soon. For now. Kindly monitor your email. Thank you.
@jeremienicole Hi JEM. Box of fruits is accepted for check-in baggage. Please make sure that it is properly packed. Thank you.
@akosikulot We are sorry to hear about this, akosikulot. May we know how can we help you?

@ri_pangan I'm sorry RIPangan. However, whatever you have chosen and supplied online will be the one reflected on our system. It will not be reverted back to original flight whether this is paid or not.
@jefoy028 Got this Jeffrey. Upon checking,  your case owner has sent you an email on September 15, 2022 at 12:30 PM. You may still send your response there.
@aaronsumulong We regret that you feel that way Aaron. We'll let your case handler know that you reached out so that we can send you an update. Please expect an email from us soon.
@ri_pangan Apologies RIPangan however for voluntary rebooking or changes in the itinerary and when the booking details have been changed, the Passenger can no longer revert to the original itinerary.
@aaronsumulong Got this Aaron. I'll make a follow-up with the case owner and we should be able to reply to you very soon.
@jefoy028 We apologize for any inconvenience Jeffrey. Can I have your case number or chat session number so I could do a follow-up?

@ri_pangan We transitioned our customer service channels 
RIPangan. If you would still need to talk to an agent, you can always chat us  through Charlie the chatbot for live agent assistance. Or, message us here: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc) and we will respond to you through email provided.

data.text: @JnAdaMm Hi jhnadm! Vape/E-cigarettes are permitted for hand carry baggage. If with built in battery, please Turn it upside down and must be individually protected to prevent accidental activation. The vape juice should also not exceed 100ml per bottle. See you!

data.text: @adventums Hi Adventums! If child has no School ID yet, you may present the child's birth certificate. This is the valid ID we accept if child travelling domestic flight.
@MarkluigieT Hi markluigie! You may check and search for the lowest fare for your preferred flight and schedule thru our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWAGam . Hope to see you on board soon!

@makatitwinktop Hi, 🇵🇭 MakatiTwink🔝! Travel requirements may vary depending on passenger's category & purpose of travel. You may visit https://t.co/5glTT4Zede for more information or coordinate with the LGU of your destination for more specific and up-to-date requirements and guidelines.

@adventums Valid ID includes Company or School ID, passport, or government-issued ID cards (e.g. SSS, GSIS, Driver’s License, Unified Multi-Purpose ID, PRC ID, PWD or PRM ID or Senior Citizen’s Identification Card).

@adventums Hi Adventums! As part of security measures, we require passengers to present a valid ID upon check-in and at the boarding gate. Valid ID we accept are ID cards which reflects on its face the name, picture, date of birth, & nationality of the guest checking-in.
